summary.what: Auto-commit entry file in timbers log
summary.why: Staged-but-uncommitted gap caused user confusion; pathspec commit is safe and eliminates manual step
summary.how: GitCommitFunc injection in FileStorage, DefaultGitCommit uses git commit -m ... -- <path> to scope to entry file only

notes: Original design likely from git-notes era where entries didn't create commits on working branch. Moving to .timbers/ files introduced the gap but the commit step was never added. Considered separate branch (like beads/entire.io) but agent DX depends on filesystem visibility â€” entries must be readable by timbers prime/draft without worktree indirection. Key safety: pathspec (--) prevents sweeping other staged files into the timbers commit.
